default_operations.details:
1. Place the sealed case in a workshop maintained at 45–55% RH.
2. Allow a minimum of four hours for acclimatization before opening.
3. Log date, time, and ambient RH.

1. Inspect wood (tenon shoulders, around posts) under raking light for fractures.
2. Check keywork plating and straightness.
3. Upload high-resolution photos.

1. Assemble without grease to assess raw fit.
2. Log each tenon as 'Loose', 'Snug (Ideal)', or 'Tight'.

1. For 14 consecutive days, play 20–30 minutes per day.
2. Log each session and swab thoroughly after use.

1. After break-in, apply a very light coat of high-quality bore oil on a pull-through.
2. 1–2 passes per joint—avoid pad contact.
3. Rest, then remove excess oil.

1. Verify rim flatness and surface finish.
2. Check undercut profiles against design spec.
3. Correct imperfections with precision facing; log pass/fail for each hole.

1. Remove factory cork; clean groove.
2. Install premium cork with beveled joint and contact cement.
3. Sand to cylindrical profile; log final diameters.

1. Select pad type (Leather/Synthetic/Cork) and size.
2. Seat with shellac; heat and float until parallel.
3. Verify seal with 0.0005" feeler gauge.

1. Measure opening heights.
2. Adjust foot corks to target specifications for an A clarinet.

1. Measure actuation force with gram gauge.
2. Adjust to A-clarinet spec sheet targets.

1. Verify linked closures (timing/pressure) with feeler gauge.
2. Regulate using cork/felt—no paper shims.

1. Seal at barrel and bell; introduce low pressure.
2. Reading on Magnehelic must be ≤ 0.2 (0–8 scale). Correct any leaks.

1. After warm-up, tune to reference (A=440/441 per client).
2. Record stabilized cent deviation for full range (no lipping).
3. Generate visual pitch curve.

1. For notes outside ±5 cents, micro-adjust.
2. Lower pitch: lower pad height.
3. Raise pitch: raise pad height or refine undercut.
4. Iterate until within tolerance.
Final holistic play-test for response, timbre, and feel; document findings.

checklist_items.notes: Acclimate case for ≥4 hours at 45–55% RH before opening.
Inspect wood and keywork; document pad/cork condition; upload photos.
Assemble dry; classify fits; log each joint.
14 days, 20–30 min/day; swab thoroughly after each use.
Light coat only; avoid pads; remove excess after rest.
Premium cork; sand to precise diameter; log measurements.
Float pads parallel; verify seal with feeler gauge.
Measure and adjust to A-clarinet targets.
Linked mechanisms close in perfect synchrony.
Map intonation tendencies across full range.
Compile logs, data, photos for client report.

template_tasks.subject: 0.1 Create Work Order
template_tasks.description: Open work order; scope, due date, client notes.

template_tasks.subject: 0.2 Visual Triage & Safety Check
template_tasks.description: Immediate risk screen; structural/keywork issues.

template_tasks.subject: 0.3 Intake Inventory & Photos
template_tasks.description: Inventory accessories; serials; high-res photos.

template_tasks.subject: 0.4 Player Profile & Preferences
template_tasks.description: Back-pressure, pitch standard (A=440/441), articulation.

template_tasks.subject: 0.5 Parts Availability Check
template_tasks.description: Confirm pads, corks, felts, adhesives availability.

template_tasks.subject: 1.1 Prep Environment & Start Data Log
template_tasks.description: Stabilize temperature/RH; start environmental logger.

template_tasks.subject: 1.2 Acclimatize Instrument
template_tasks.description: Acclimatization window prior to diagnostics.

template_tasks.subject: 1.3 Wood Moisture/Condition Note
template_tasks.description: Assess moisture/condition; note risks.

template_tasks.subject: 2.1 Tenon Fit (No Grease) — Baseline
template_tasks.description: Dry-fit feel, lateral play, pull-out force baseline.

template_tasks.subject: 2.2 Bore & Tone-Hole Map
template_tasks.description: Borescope; map tone-hole flatness/finish; note variances.

template_tasks.subject: 2.3 Keywork Survey
template_tasks.description: Check endplay/sideplay; bent keys/rods; fasteners.

template_tasks.subject: 2.4 Pad & Spring Condition
template_tasks.description: Per-key pad type/condition; spring material/condition.

template_tasks.subject: 2.5 Airtightness (Baseline)
template_tasks.description: Method + reading; locate/record leaks.

template_tasks.subject: 2.6 Quick Intonation Pass
template_tasks.description: Reference pitch set; sketch initial pitch tendencies.

template_tasks.subject: 2.7 Parts/Risk Finalization & Client OK
template_tasks.description: Finalize parts list/risks; client approval before invasive work.

template_tasks.subject: 3.1 Disassembly & Cleaning
template_tasks.description: Systematic teardown; clean; tray/label sub-assemblies.

template_tasks.subject: 3.2 Keywork Truing & Play Control
template_tasks.description: Straighten keys/rods; swedge/re-tube; set end/sideplay.

template_tasks.subject: 3.3 Tone-Hole Flatting/Chamfering
template_tasks.description: Correct tone-hole surfaces while preserving geometry.

template_tasks.subject: 3.4 Tenon Corks (Replace/Refit)
template_tasks.description: Install premium corks; sand to spec; log diameters.

template_tasks.subject: 3.5 Pad Selection & Installation
template_tasks.description: Select/install pads; float/seat; verify seal.

template_tasks.subject: 3.6 Springing & Regulation
template_tasks.description: Adjust spring tensions to A-clarinet gram-force targets; synchronize linkages.

template_tasks.subject: 3.7 Initial Key Heights (Venting)
template_tasks.description: Set venting per A-clarinet spec; trim stops.

template_tasks.subject: 3.8 Airtightness (Post-Mechanical)
template_tasks.description: Comprehensive leak test after mechanics/pads/regulation.

template_tasks.subject: 4.1 Pitch Curve (Baseline)
template_tasks.description: Measure cent deviation across full range; capture environment & setup.

template_tasks.subject: 4.2 Voicing & Micro-Adjust
template_tasks.description: Iterative key-height/pad/undercut micro-adjust to targets.

template_tasks.subject: 4.3 Response & Articulation Validation
template_tasks.description: Attacks pp–ff; register transitions; throat/altissimo stability.

template_tasks.subject: 4.4 Iteration / Lock Targets
template_tasks.description: Converge and lock final regulation and acoustic targets.

template_tasks.subject: 5.1 Airtightness (Final QA)
template_tasks.description: Final documented airtightness to shop standard.

template_tasks.subject: 5.2 Functional QA (Cycle Test)
template_tasks.description: Cycle keys (e.g., 50x); verify rebound, silence, regulation stability.

template_tasks.subject: 5.3 Play-Test Sign-Off
template_tasks.description: Holistic musical test; final technician sign-off.

template_tasks.subject: 5.4 Documentation Pack
template_tasks.description: Photos; measurements; pitch map; care guide; warranty.

template_tasks.subject: 5.5 Certificate of Acoustic Performance
template_tasks.description: Generate and attach certificate; QA manager sign-off.

template_tasks.subject: 6.1 Client Handover & Demo
template_tasks.description: Demonstrate results; review measured outcomes and characteristics.

template_tasks.subject: 6.2 Care & Break-In Guide
template_tasks.description: Provide care + break-in guidance for pads and humidity control.

template_tasks.subject: 6.3 Follow-Up Check Booking
template_tasks.description: Schedule post-break-in check; set reminders.

template_tasks.subject: C1 Tool Calibration Log (Pre-Work Check)
template_tasks.description: Verify calibration status (spring gauge, feelers, manometer, calipers).

template_tasks.subject: C2 Materials & Lot Tracking
template_tasks.description: Record lot/batch numbers for corks, pads, adhesives, oils; link to work order.

template_tasks.subject: C3 Audit Sampling (1-in-10) Post-Delivery
template_tasks.description: Random post-delivery QA sampling; document findings and corrective actions.
